meanings: (아무 생각 없이) thoughtlessly, mindlessly; (아무렇게나) recklessly, carelessly; (성급하게) rashly; (경솔하게) indiscreetly; (허락 없이) without permission[leave]
go into the jaws of death

examples.korean: Don’t play around with my tools! 발음듣기 내 도구들을 함부로 만지지 마! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t play around with my tools! 발음

examples.korean: (유머) Have you been taking my name in vain again? 발음듣기 너 또 내 이름 함부로 들먹이고 있었지? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: (유머) Have you been taking my name in vain again? 발음

examples.korean: She’ll always let him walk all over her. 발음듣기 그녀는 언제나 그가 자기를 함부로 대하도록 내버려둘 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’ll always let him walk all over her. 발음

examples.korean: They’ve built a high fence all round to keep intruders out. 발음듣기 그들은 아무나 함부로 들어오지 못하게 하려고 온통 빙 돌아가며 높은 울타리를 쳐 놓았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They’ve built a high fence all round to keep intruders out. 발음

examples.korean: ‘George is so careless with money.’ ‘Look who’s talking!’ 발음듣기 “조지는 돈에 대해 너무 조심성이 없어[돈을 너무 함부로 써].” “사돈 남 말 하는군!” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘George is so careless with money.’ ‘Look who’s talking!’ 발음
